channel.title: Times of India
channel.description: The Times of India: Breaking news, views, reviews, cricket from across India
channel.copyright: Copyright:(C) 2012 Bennett Coleman & Co. Ltd, http://info.indiatimes.com/terms/tou.html

item.title: Why should I apologise, MCA officials were rude to me: SRK
item.description: "It is wrong to say that I was under the influence of alcohol. I was not drunk, only misbehaved when I was provoked. Security officers bullied me," SRK said.

item.title: Road rage in Delhi: Bikers attack three judges, one injured
item.description: One of the judges Ajay Garg suffered head injuries while two of his colleagues additional sessions judges Inderjit Singh and M K Nagpal escaped unhurt.

item.title: Yoga guru Ramdev's trusts lose tax exemption, I-T slaps Rs 58 crore notice
item.description: The ED, meanwhile, has detected a Rs 7 crore alleged contravention under the FEMA in the remittances made by Yoga guru Ramdev's trusts.

item.title: Ajmer shrine yet to receive Zardari's Rs 5cr donation
item.description: Pakistan president's one-million-dollar donation to Khwaja’s Moinuddin Chishti’s shrine at Ajmer, has turned out to be just an announcement with not a single penny being received either by the management of the shrine or khadims.

item.title: Whites now account for under half of births in US
item.description: After years of speculation, estimates and projections, the Census Bureau has made it official: White births are no longer a majority in the US.
